snippet.title: The Shield: The Game - Gameplay PS2 HD 720P
snippet.description:
The Shield: The Game - Gameplay PS2 HD 720P

Visit us at http://god-games.webs.com for more

Game is available here:

http://astore.amazon.co.uk/godg-21/detail/B000QSBR8A
or 
http://astore.amazon.com/rockscenewebn-20/detail/B000JSC56U


Enhanced graphics with emulator PCSX 2.For recording I used a Live Gamer HD Capture Card (no FPS Drops).
-some games can have graphical issues, lags and other problems...

PC specs:
- CPU Intel Core i5 760
- RAM 8 GB
- GPU Gefoce GTX 560
- Windows 7 (64 bit)

PCSX2 1.1.0.5557 (svn) Feb 12 2013 specs:
- try yourself (more info at my site in forums section)


::::: Rate, Comment & Subscribe :::::
